effect.shortEffect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
effect.full: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

description.sun-moon: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the  Pokémon’s HP is full.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the  Pokémon’s HP is full.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is full.
description.sword-shield: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is full.
